SELECT a.id ,a.title ,a.content ,a.hit ,a.regName ,a.regDttm ,a.updDttm ,a.`order` ,a.grp ,a.lvl ,a.isPrivate ,a.parentId ,a.totalCommentCount FROM board a WHERE id = #{contentId}
